DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this research is to study and determine the effects of Aliskiren on blood vessels and blood flow. The primary hypothesis is that Aliskiren will increase endothelial function by 30% or more in comparison to the placebo group.
DOC.brief_title: The Effect of Aliskiren on Endothelial Function in Pre-Diabetes and Diabetes
